response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I understand the importance of this opportunity for you and would like to extend an exclusive offer. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits of our product, I propose to sell it to you for $1,200,000. This offer represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this proposal. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
